contentList.content: A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Roahton Mobar, whose stances were broad and strong.
A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Kimigha Poji, whose stances were narrow and swift.

A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Strigga Morkoscavich, whose stances moved fluidly, flawlessly, and who defanged the Serpent one blustery night.
The Sturdy Cloth
A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Dravik Halmoren, whose stances were wide and unyielding.
You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_BEARS_ENDURANCE">Bear's Endurance</LSTag> and increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> score by [1], to a maximum [2].
The Bear

Reduce all incoming damage by 1, and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag>.
The Cunning Cloth
A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Vorik Emberhand, whose stances were precice and magical.
You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FOXS_CUNNING">Fox's Cunning</LSTag> and increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> score by [1], to a maximum [2].
Stupider like a Fox
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> to maintain <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag>
The Lucid Cloth
A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Kaelum Fironeth, whose stances were prudent and insightful.
You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_OWLS_WISDOM">Owl's Wisdom</LSTag> and increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> score by [1], to a maximum [2].
Sentinel Owl
You gain a +[1] bonus to Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and you can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>.
The Splendid Cloth
A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Caspian Starfall, whose stances were fabulous and powerful.
You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_EAGLES_SPLENDOR">Eagle's Splendour</LSTag> and increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score by [1], to a maximum [2].
Majestic Eagle

You can see in the dark up to [1] and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>.
Thread of Uninhibited Kushigo
Thread of Universal Kushigo
This bit of thread catches the light in strange ways, seeming to shimmer despite not actually being reflective.
The Physical Cloth
A garment that harnesses the martial prowess of Roahton Mobar, Kimigha Poji, and Dravik Halmoren. The wearer's stances will become strong, swift, and sturdy.
Manticore's Physicality
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>

You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MANTICORES_PHYSICALITY">Manticore's Physicality</LSTag> and increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by [1] to a maximum [2].
Legend of the Manticore
You can't be pushed against your will, your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> distance is increased by [1], and all damage you take is reduced by [2].
The Mental Cloth
A garment that harnesses the martial prowess of Vorik Emberhand, Kaelum Fironeth, and Caspian Starfall. The wearer's stances will become precise, prudent, and powerful.
Sphinx's Mentality
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>

You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_SPHINXS_MENTALITY">Sphinx's Mentality</LSTag> and increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by [1] to a maximum [2].
Riddle of the Sphinx

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on maintaining <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag>, can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag> and you can see in the dark up to [1].
The Universal Cloth

A garment that channels the power of all the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. The wearer's stances become perfect, ensuring that never again will another Serpent show its fangs in their city.
Hydra's Universality
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>

You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_HYDYRAS_UNIVERSALITY">Hydra's Universality</LSTag> and increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by [1] to a maximum [2].
Hail Hydra

Gain the effects of <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="MAG_DBT_Physical_Side_Effect">Legend of the Manticore</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="MAG_DBT_Mental_Side_Effect">Riddle of the Sphinx</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="CarryWeight">carrying capacity</LSTag> is doubled and falling damage is halved.
Enhance Physical Ability
Enhance Mental Ability

Bestow a magical enhancement upon yourself. You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> with a chosen <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Ability</LSTag>.
